chunks.zh: 目前手机已经用六年了，有比我更久的么
chunks.en: My phone has been used for six years, has anyone used theirs longer?

chunks.zh: 三星 S9+。从开始有刘海屏，挖孔屏各种奇形怪状屏之后就断绝了换手机的念头，即使 S9+换了电池也改不了续航尿崩。
chunks.en: Samsung S9+. Since the advent of notched screens, punch-hole screens, and various other strange-shaped screens, I've given up on the idea of replacing my phone, even though replacing the battery on the S9+ couldn't fix the terrible battery life.

chunks.zh: 最近终于卡的有点受不了了，异形屏就异形屏吧。
chunks.en: Recently, it's finally become unbearable with the lag; a strange-shaped screen is fine.

chunks.zh: 看了一大圈不知道买啥，需求基本只有续航，拍照，无内置广告。
chunks.en: After looking around, I don't know what to buy. The basic requirements are only battery life, photography, and no built-in advertisements.

chunks.zh: 首先排除华为和苹果。
chunks.en: First, eliminate Huawei and Apple.

chunks.zh: 然后新三星太贵。
chunks.en: Then, the new Samsung is too expensive.

chunks.zh: 剩下国产没用无广告的。
chunks.en: The remaining domestic phones don't have ads.

chunks.zh: 完蛋。
chunks.en: Damn.

chunks.zh: 18 年 1 月 4 号买的小米 6 ，今年准备换了
chunks.en: Bought a Xiaomi 6 on January 4, 2018, planning to change it this year.

chunks.zh: 一加 8t ，目前还没发现需要换手机的痛点
chunks.en: OnePlus 8T, haven't found the pain point of needing to replace the phone yet.

chunks.zh: 买个两三年的二手三星旗舰。结帖。
chunks.en: Buy a second-hand Samsung flagship from two or three years ago. End of Post.

chunks.zh: 差 4 个月 5 年。不出意外还能用下去。realme x
chunks.en: Almost 5 years. It should still work without any issues. realme x

chunks.zh: 我的 R15X 骁龙 660 用了 5 年了。
chunks.en: My R15X with Snapdragon 660 has been used for 5 years.

chunks.zh: 我的手机已经用了三个半月了😂
chunks.en: My phone has been used for three and a half months 😂

chunks.zh: @nzynzynzy cpu 硬盘 配件类的买二手还好，手机我反正是接受不了。
chunks.en: @nzynzynzy Buying second-hand CPUs, hard drives, and other components is fine, but I can't accept a second-hand phone.

chunks.zh: 我都是买新机给老婆用，然后老婆把旧手机给我用，目前用 iPhone X 。
chunks.en: I always buy a new phone for my wife, and then my wife gives me her old phone; currently using an iPhone X.

chunks.zh: 其实还是推荐你 iPhone 。
chunks.en: Actually, I still recommend iPhone.

chunks.zh: 苹果实在不行的话，建议买能刷海外版系统的大容量电池手机。
chunks.en: If Apple doesn't work, I suggest buying a phone with a large-capacity battery that can flash overseas systems.

chunks.zh: S23 Ultra 价格已经崩不住了，估摸着马上奔着 5 开头了，可以考虑看看
chunks.en: The price of the S23 Ultra can't hold up anymore, I estimate it will soon start with a 5, you can consider it.

chunks.zh: 三星 note2 ，换过 3 次电池（可拆卸的好处），root 了现在还在用来远程打卡。结帖。
chunks.en: Samsung Note2, replaced the battery 3 times (the advantage of removable batteries), rooted and now it's used for remote clocking in. End of Post.

chunks.zh: S20U 准备去售后换电池了
chunks.en: S20U is going to the after-sales service to replace the battery.

chunks.zh: mate 20x  5 年半
chunks.en: mate 20x 5 and a half years

chunks.zh: 18 年的荣耀 v10 用到去年...
chunks.en: Used Honor V10 from 2018 until last year...

chunks.zh: 我的 iPhone 6SP 用了 6 年多
chunks.en: My iPhone 6SP has been used for over 6 years

chunks.zh: XR 准备再坚持一年
chunks.en: XR is going to hold on for another year

chunks.zh: 18 年底买的 XR ，上个月自己手动换了一个屏幕，再战
chunks.en: Bought an XR at the end of 2018, and replaced the screen manually last month, ready for another battle

chunks.zh: 我 18 年 XR ，同事还在用 8P
chunks.en: My XR from 2018, my colleague is still using 8P

chunks.zh: @crayygy 原计划就是等 S24U 出来换 23U ，但 24U 评价好像拉了，23U 价格不降反升，现在就是不知道等到什么时间合适，想多降一点再买，又怕时间久 23U 库存没了买不到。
chunks.en: @crayygy The original plan was to wait for the S24U to come out and replace the 23U, but the reviews of the 24U don't seem good, and the price of the 23U has risen instead of falling. Now I don't know when it's suitable to wait. I want the price to drop more before buying, but I'm afraid the 23U will be out of stock if I wait too long.

chunks.zh: 其实不喜欢那根笔，想要 23+，但 23+电池太小。
chunks.en: Actually, I don't like that pen, I want the 23+, but the 23+ battery is too small.

chunks.zh: @zhang1215 你这有点厉害的
chunks.en: @zhang1215 You're a bit amazing.

chunks.zh: 前几个月才用媳妇的 iPhone 12 替换 我的 iPhone 6s
chunks.en: A few months ago, I replaced my iPhone 6s with my wife's iPhone 12.
